page.title: 04Biography. Life Styles.
page.content: The favourite food is chips.On television the girls mostly like Grange Hill and the boys Street Hawk. The girls most common star sign is Aquarius,the boys,Capricorn. {Monday Morning by Megan Andrews. On Monday I get up at 7.30 am, get dressed, do my hair , then clean my teeth, then I go down stairs about 8.00 am. I have my breakfast which is either 3 slices of toast and Marmite , or Tescos Honey Muesli with no milk and a cup of coffee and then play the piano , until 8.20 am. Then I go up stairs and wash with Heaven Scent soap. I get my coat on and wait until Claire Bailey gets here, then we walk to school. I am usually in the school play ground at about five to nine. The whistle goes at 9.15 am. To school I wear a skirt, short sleeved blouse,
